text: Logon ki khufiya sargoshiyon(secret talks) mein aksar o beshtar koi bhalayi nahin hoti, haan agar koi posheeda taur par sadaqa o khairaat ki talqeen karey ya kisi neik kaam ke liye ya logon ke maamlaat mein islah karne ke liye kisi se kuch kahey to yeh albatta bhali baat hai. Aur jo koi Allah ki raza-joyi ke liye aisa karega usey hum bada ajar ata karenge
